CustomField.description: Overall rest violation result. If any rest related violation is true, then true
CustomField.formula: IF ( OR ( Active_Session_Violation__c, Rest_Break_Duration_Violation__c , Shift_Break_Violation__c ), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: True if Active Session Violation, Rest Break Duration Violation, or Shift Break Violation return true.
CustomField.label: Rest Violation
